main_definition: Energized or operated with the use of power, typically electricity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Equipped to run using electrical energy.
meanings_and_examples.example: The laptop is powered by a rechargeable battery.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Using the force generated by electricity or other forms of energy.
meanings_and_examples.example: The drill is powered by an electric motor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Employing authority, control, or influence to achieve a desired outcome.
meanings_and_examples.example: She has been empowered to make executive decisions in the company.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Operating with efficiency and effectiveness through technological advancements.
meanings_and_examples.example: The modern powered saws are much more efficient than older models.
